00012 ASyncObject::ASyncObject() {
00013        m_handleSemaphore = NULL;
00014 }
00015 
00016 ASyncObject::~ASyncObject() {
00017        if (IsValid())
00018               Delete();
00019 }
00020 
00021 void ASyncObject::Delete() {
00022        if (m_handleSemaphore != NULL) {
00023               vQueueDelete(m_handleSemaphore);
00024               m_handleSemaphore = NULL;
00025        }
00026 }
00027 
00028 void ASyncObject::Attach(xGenericHandle handle) {
00029        assert(handle != NULL);
00030 
00031        if (IsValid()) {
00032               Delete();
00033        }
00034        m_handleSemaphore = handle;
00035 }
